snippet: While on vacation in the Caribbean, Rupert Murdoch, the head of News Corporation, joined Twitter, and promptly sent out tweets about the British work ethic, the Republican presidential race and Central Park at holiday time.
abstract: While on vacation in the Caribbean, Rupert Murdoch, the head of News Corporation, joined Twitter, and promptly sent out tweets about the British work ethic, the Republican presidential race and Central Park at holiday time.

headline.main: On Yacht, Murdoch Catches the Twitter Wave
